## Description {#details}

This file provides the interface for IR based instrumentation passes ( (profile-gen, and profile-use).

<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The instrumentation (profile-instr-gen) pass for IR based PGO.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use this pass to create COMDAT profile variables for context</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sensitive PGO (CSPGO). The reason to have a pass for this is CSPGO</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be run after LTO/ThinLTO linking. Lld linker needs to see</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all the COMDAT variables before linking. So we have this pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// always run before linking for CSPGO.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pgoinstrumentationgencreatevar"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pgoinstrumentationgencreatevar/#a2d16ea60d9c4f4219d62160558e02574">PGOInstrumentationGenCreateVar</a></span></CodeLine>
